# 5 Years Facing the Ocean: Advancing Rights to Information, Gender Equality, Youth Engagement in East-Asia

## Description

Since 2019, participants and members of civic hacking communities in Japan (Code for Japan), Korea (Code for Korea), and Taiwan (g0v.tw)  have been organizing the Facing the Ocean (FtO) regional network.
